title: Cloud 9 and TSM debut the future of LoL esports

replies.body: april fools?
No.
Hi Sheep, do you know when the event stops? I mean, is it already tomorrow? ^.^
I hope they make it permanent this is one of the best game modes they have came out with yet!!
They probably wont make it a game type, it would be nice if they made it an option in custom mode however.

I agree!

MutatedMango commented that nothing will beat Showdown, but Showdown suffered from being too short and didn't see a lot of play as a whole. If anything, it was probably (and unfortunately) the worse mode to have been released thus far.
Its all week and it will be permanent next season i think
I hope it really does stay for good.
they said it would be up this whole week so, I'm guessing until end of week or next monday night?
...unless that was an april's fools joke...
Next week. And if they actually do this it'll be hillarious
Holy crap Sheep is talking to commoners. All praise the baaaaaa
It is only what he is allowed to say! LIES!!!
hi sheep

played against XDG Sheep in team builder match... lee sin top lane... also had C9 gleebglarbu..
lost pretty bad lol

compleete april fools, league i love the ideal, it has never been pitched, now on april fools a game mode comes out and " the feature of LoL"     would of had me if it would of be mentioned on surrender at 20    at few weeks ago, but it wasnt so happy april fools to you
You did it, You killed english.
League of Legend is not an essay submission program or word correction program.

No it is not a submission nor essay program, it is a MOBA. But since this is a forum for discussions about LoL it would be nice to be able to understand what one another are saying and this guy makes absolutely no sense. Taking the time to proofread is worth the 15 seconds or so otherwise if it is not worth the time, why bother even posting?
It was so bad, I logged in just to down-vote.
"the future of League of Legends, the Ultra Rapid Fire update. Set to go live this coming preseason," is probably an april fools part. but let's have fun while it lasts
Bound to be a good game tomorrow ;)
{{champion:81}}
HAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAI
Turtle, I'm not just a Catgirl, but I'm the best one in NA, pls ignore the fact I'm a CLG fan and marry me Wildsenpai~!
Best ADC NA right here folks :)
Bro that would be Sneaky...
KEEP THIS GAME MODE PLEASE RITO
April fools could have been: We fixed EUW! :D
Or we fixed all the lag issues.{{summoner:4}}
This actually sounds fun, too bad it's fake
It's not. Log on to league.
Ultra Rapid Fire. = URF
You just blew my fucking mind....
You totally got me till: 'we removed Kassadin. POOF.' Ahahahahaha you guys are the best.
What this patch needs is a change to Nidalee's Q: Range changed to infinite.
everyone talking about it being an april fool's joke without even logging on and seeing it's live.{{champion:161}}
C9 The BEST !!!!{{champion:9}}
ENABLE ARAM URF PLZ
Too bad it's April Fools day :) It does sound pretty awesome however, with half death timers it might even have been belieavable for a few minutes. Nice one though :)
You realize it is live??? or are you too lazy to update and see for yourself????
This is the best joke I have ever seen pulled. They release and actual gamemode on April 1st because they know everyone is going to be paranoid it's a joke. Inception
IT AINT EVEN APRIL FOOLS SON, THIS IS THE BEST GAMEMODE. ADC GANGPLANK IS NOW REAL
1st of April .... i hate jokes
dude.... its not a joke, its the most fun game mode i have played to date
hope TSM wins

10/10 
GJ Riot. I still hate you, though.
